content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Setup at position(37.0, -85.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill mining coal
- Wooden chest at position(36.5, -86.5) for collecting mined coal

### Iron/Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(-28.0, -61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at position(-27.5, -59.5) collecting ore (contains iron and copper ore)
- Burner inserter at position(-26.5, -59.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at position(-27.0, -58.0) for smelting
- Burner inserter at position(-25.5, -58.5) moving plates to storage
- Wooden chest at position(-24.5, -58.5) storing plates (contains iron and copper plates)
- Additional furnaces and inserters in similar configuration at positions(-23.0, -58.0) and (-21.0, -58.0)

### Iron Mining Complex at position(-10.0, -59.0)
Consists of:
- Three burner mining drills at positions(-10.0, -59.0), (-8.0, -59.0), (-6.0, -59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests collecting ore at positions(-9.5, -57.5), (-7.5, -57.5), (-5.5, -57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Smelting Line at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Four stone furnaces in a row at positions(0.0, 0.0), (2.0, 0.0), (4.0, 0.0), (6.0, 0.0)
- Input wooden chests at positions(0.5, -2.5), (2.5, -2.5), (4.5, -2.5), (6.5, -2.5)
- Output wooden chests at positions(0.5, 2.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 2.5), (6.5, 2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing input/output

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(4.5, 20.5)
- Boiler at position(-1.5, 22.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected pipe network for water flow
- Electric poles at positions(11.5, 20.5) and (7.5, 20.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to fuel management
- Multiple "out of fuel" warnings across burner mining drills and inserters
- Ensure all burner devices have adequate coal supply before operation
- Set up automated coal delivery system to keep machines running

### Errors related to material extraction
- Cannot extract from positions that are too far away
- Move closer to the target resource before attempting extraction

### Errors related to item insertion
- Verify inventory has required items before attempting insertion
- Check if target entity can accept the type of item being inserted

### Errors related to fluid systems
- Steam engine showing "no input liquid" warning
- Ensure proper pipe connections between offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine
- Verify water flow path is unobstructed

### Power distribution issues
- Lab showing "NO_POWER" status
- Verify electrical connections between power generation and consuming entities
- Ensure power poles are properly connected and within range of each other
